__e: The poor girl is living in hell because of her scumbag pimp.
A middle-aged pimp who pretends to be the judge of all that is right and good in the world.
So I leave my bitch in the room with him for a night to see if she can handle some real pimping, you dig?
Yes, and that's between me, her and her maker.
It was probably more, but that's all I could get from her pimp.
And we think that whoever she works for, her pimp, did this to her.
He could have been a good pimp and taken a good care of my mother.
I already told you I ain't got no pimp, and y'all can't prove I did a damn thing, so what the hell am I even doing here?
You pimp me out to your friend, and it's my fault?
